name: Rome Swat Strike Team
description:
A group of mafia and terrorists trying to smuggle armed weapon and illegal drugs through the rivers into the city. They are trying to disguise as tourists and will make their way through the rush hour to their destination.
You are heading this operation by following them on the boat and will keep an eye on every movement of enemies. It’s a newest 3d action game to fight enemies and destroy their network. They are armed with the modern weapons and their elite strike team will take anyone down, comes in their way. Cripple rival forces and mercenaries; don’t let them sail away from your sight.

Your army training simulator demands only the best of you. In order to succeed you will have to work hard. Keep your nerves under control or break like a twig. You'll need to make split-second decisions. Shoot bad guys, rescue civilians. Only the truly talented and hard-sweating operators will be accepted to the rank of the military special unit.
So the gunner battle is on, let’s see who wins

Game Features

Realistic 3d environment of Venice
Mini Gun, Rocket Launcher and many more weapons
Life kit, armor to protect yourself
Amazing Sound effects
